sentences.sContent: Give us the ballot and we will quietly and nonviolently, without rancor or bitterness, implement the Supreme Court's decision of May 17, 1954.
sentences.sContent_eng: Give us the ballot and we will quietly and nonviolently, without rancor or bitterness, implement the Supreme Court's decision of May 17, 1954.
sentences.sCn: 给我们选举权，我们就会平静非暴力，不引起怨恨和苦难，使1954年5月17日最高法院的决议生效
